This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/619380906/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DA+Empr+stimos+-+v1.0.1). <MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /business-loans)```. **FamilyType**: ```Empr√©stimos``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/619380906/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DA+Empr+stimos+-+v1.0.1). The path can be chosen by the client.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"page","description":"N√∫mero da p√°gina que est√° sendo requisitada (o valor da primeira p√°gina √© 1).","schema":{"format":"int32","default":1,"maximum":2147483647,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"},{"name":"page-size","description":"Quantidade total de registros por p√°ginas.","schema":{"format":"int32","default":25,"maximum":1000,"minimum":1,"type":"integer"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
